entry.title: devdeals/devdeals.org
entry.summary:
A list of SaaS, PaaS, IaaS and other software offerings that have special deals for developers

devdeals.org

Developers and open source authors have many services available with a range of free tiers and promotions, and have access to deals from Brex, Carta, Deel, Product Hunt, Stripe and more. However, there is no open source, free and curated list of the best deals.

This is a definitive list of software (SaaS, PaaS, IaaS, hosting, etc.) with deals for developers. All deals should be the best available and, over time, proprietary to this repo with the code DEVDEALS.

This repo accepts Pull Requests so please send them to add more services (or by remove ones whose offerings have changed).

NOTE: This list is limited to as-a-Service (not self-hosted) offerings that developers, technical entreprenuers and/or startup founders would find useful. For a service to be eligible it has to be at scale and have a compelling deal or discount (not just a free trial). Please don't be offended if we reject your contribution.

Table of Contents

  • Premiums Deals
  • Analytics, Events and Statistics
  • Cloud Services
  • Communications & productivity
  • Coworking
  • Crash and Exception Handling
  • Design and UI
  • Email
  • Finance, banking, accounting & tax
  • Forms
  • Hiring, HR, benefits & payroll
  • Marketing, CRM & Support
  • Miscellaneous
  • Monitoring
  • Password Management
  • Payment and Billing Integration
  • Product Development
  • SaaS tools and Services
  • Search
  • Security & compliance
  • Storage and Media Processing
  • Tools for Teams and Collaboration

Premium Deals

  • Airtable - Create apps that perfectly fit your team's needs. $2,000 Airtable credit with CARTA.
  • AWS Activate - Cloud computing services. Receive $5k, $25k, or $100k in credits with DEVDEALS.
  • Brex - Spend management software and live support. Up to 50,000 Brex points with DEEL.
  • ClickUp - Tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, & more. $3000 in ClickUp credits with DEVDEALS.
  • Digital Ocean - Cloud Computing Platform. $250 credits over 12 months with DEVDEALS.
  • Google Cloud - Cloud computing services. Minimum $2,000 in Google Cloud credits with DEVDEALS.
  • IBM Cloud - Cloud data management. $3,000/month in IBM Cloud credits for 6 months with DEVDEALS.
  • Microsoft for Startups - Cloud computing services. Up to $120,000 in Azure Cloud Credits with DEVDEALS.
  • MongoDB - Modern data platform. $3,600 in credits for MongoDB Atlas with DEVDEALS.
  • Notion - Notes, tasks, wikis & more. $1,000 in credits off the Notion Team Plan with DEVDEALS.
  • Retool - Build custom internal tools remarkably fast. $1,200 for Retool Cloud with DEVDEALS.
  • Slack - A messaging program for workspace. 25% off eligible plan upgrades for 12 months with DEVDEALS.
  • Snowflake - A platform to increase the growth of your startup. $5,000 credits on Snowflake with DEVDEALS.
  • Stripe - Integrated payments platform. Waived process fees for $20k with CARTAPTNR.
  • Twilio - Developer platform for communications. Up to $5,000 in Twilio credits with DEVDEALS.
  • Twilio SendGrid - Email Marketing Services. $1,800 in SendGrid credits with DEVDEALS.
  • WeWork - Workspace management. 50% off WeWork All Access for 6 months with DEEL50.

Analytics, Events and Statistics

  • Amplitude - Product intelligence platform. 12 months free on Growth plan with DEVDEALS.
  • Howuku - All-in-one platform to understand your website. 50% off for 12 months with JOINSECRET.
  • Mixpanel - Product analytics. $50,000 in credits with DEVDEALS.
  • Moesif - Analysis tool for your APIs. 50% off for 3 months for the plan Grow with JOINSECRETGROW2.
  • Segment - Customer data platform. $50K in Segment credits + more with DEVDEALS.

Cloud Services

  • AWS Activate - Cloud computing services. Receive $5k, $25k, or $100k in credits with DEVDEALS.
  • Cloudways - Cloud hosting service. 30% off for 3 months with DEVDEALS.
  • Digital Ocean - Cloud computing services. $250 credits over 12 months with DEVDEALS.
  • Google Cloud - Cloud computing services. Minimum $2,000 in Google Cloud credits with DEVDEALS.
  • IBM Cloud - Cloud data management. $3,000/month in IBM Cloud credits for 6 months with DEVDEALS.
  • Mergify - Automation service for software engineering. 4 months of subscription free with DEELPERK.
  • Microsoft for Startups - Cloud computing services. Up to $120,000 in Azure Cloud Credits with DEVDEALS.
  • MongoDB - Modern data platform. $3,600 in credits for MongoDB Atlas with DEVDEALS.
  • Snowflake - A platform to increase the growth of your startup. $5,000 credits on Snowflake with DEVDEALS.
  • Twilio - Developer platform for communications. Up to $5,000 in Twilio credits with DEVDEALS.
  • WP Engine - Discount service provider. 3 months free on annual plans with DEVDEALS.

Communications & productivity

  • Commsor - Community operating system. 25% off first year with LETSDEEL-25.
  • Customer.io - Marketing automation platform. 12 months free Startup Basic Plan with DEVDEALS.
  • Dialpad - Voice, video, messages, and meetings. $5,000+ for phone lines & video conferencing with CARTA.
  • Flow - Task and project management software. 35% off any plan for 12 months with SECRET35..
  • Google Workspace - Employee productivity suite. 20% off the Standard or Plus plan with DEVDEALS.
  • GoToMeeting - Fast, reliable, and secure video conferencing. 25% off 1 year of GoToMeeting with DEEL.
  • Intercom - Customer relationship management. 95% off Advanced Intercom features with DEVDEALS.
  • LiveAgent - Customer support software. $120 credits on any plan with DEVDEALS.
  • LiveChat - Customer service & chat software. $150 credits with DEVDEALS.
  • Make - A no-code solution for workflow automation. 3 months free on Pro Plan with SECRET.
  • Twilio Flex - Cloud communications platform. 5,000 user agent hours worth $5,000. with DEEL.
  • Yext - A search platform integrated into the customer journey. $35,000 credits on Yext with SecretYS2022.

Coworking

  • WeWork - Workspace management. 50% off WeWork All Access for 6 months with DEEL50.

Crash and Exception Handling

  • Sentry - Error & performance and debugging monitoring. $150 credit with SENTRYSECRET.

Design and UI

  • Bubble - SaaS platforms, marketplaces and CRMs without code. 30% off for 3 months with DEEL2021.

Email

  • Mailjet - Email marketing service provider. 6 months free on the Premium plan with DEVDEALS.
  • Mailmodo - Email marketing solution. 50% off for the first 6 months with CODA.
  • Twilio SendGrid - Email Marketing Services. $1,800 in SendGrid credits. with DEVDEALS.

Finance, banking, accounting & tax

  • Brex - Spend management software and live support. Up to 50,000 Brex points with DEEL.
  • Carta - Capital management. 20% off your first year on a paid plan with DEEL.
  • Clearco - Growth capital for online businesses. $100 credit on the first capital advance with DEEL.
  • Guideline - Plans for small businesses . No employer fees for 3 months. with DEEL.
  • MainStreet - Tax solutions. 25% off tax credit processing fees with CARTA.
  • Mercury - Banking built for startups. $250 when you spend $10K with DEEL.
  • Pilot - Financial expertise. 20% off of pilot care or select for six months with CARTA.
  • Pipe - Trading platform. Waived trading fees for the first 18 months with CARTA.
  • Quickbooks - Business and financial management suite. 40% off for 6 months with DEEL.
  • Ramp - Corporate cards and finance platform. $1000 Amazon Gift Card with DEEL.
  • Vouch Insurance - Insurance for venture backed companies. Save up to 25% on coverage with CARTA.
  • Xero - Online accounting software. 30-day free trial with X30DEEL.

Forms

  • Tally - Create forms efficiently, in just a few seconds.. Get 50% off Tally Pro for 1 year with JOINSECRET.
  • Typeform - Build beautiful, interactive forms. 30% off Professional or Premium with LETSDEEL_30OFF.

Hiring, HR, benefits & payroll

  • 15Five - Performance management platform. 20% discount with DEVDEALS.
  • Deel - Payroll & compliance. 30% off contractors and first employee free for 12 months with CARTA.
  • Gusto - Payroll and HR platform. 50% off for 12 months with BREX.
  • Indeed - HR management. €100 credits with SECRET.
  • justworks - Payroll, benefits, HR, and compliance. 1 month free of admin fees & account manager with CARTA.
  • Lattice - Performance management, employee engagement & development. 10% off with DEVDEALS.
  • legalpad - US visa services. $500 credit for visa and green card services with CARTA.
  • Namely - HR, payroll, benefits, and compliance platform. 6 months free Namely Payroll with CARTA.
  • Panther - Payroll, benefits, taxes, and local compliance. Save with $20,000 in Panther Credits with CARTA.
  • Remote - Payroll, benefits, HR, and compliance. 1st hire free + 2 months free for additional hires with CARTA.
  • Rippling - Payroll, Benefits, Computers, Apps and more. 6 months free Rippling payroll with DEVDEALS.
  • Workable - Hiring platform for your company or business. 10% off for first year with DEEL.
  • Zenefits - Payroll, benefits, HR, time & attendance. Free payroll for 1 year, or 20% off with DEVDEALS.

Legal

  • Docsend - Share & manage documents easily and securely.. 90% off your annual plans with SECRET.
  • Stripe Atlas - Business starter service. 50% off on Stripe Atlas with SECRET.

Marketing, CRM & Support

  • ActiveCampaign - Marketing automation. 90% off any annual plan for the first year. with DEVDEALS.
  • Adjust - Mobile measurement. 3 months free trial with DEEL.
  • Constant Contact - Marketing platform. 50% off for up to 1 year on the Core and Plus plans. with SECRET50.
  • Freshworks - CRM, livechat, support & marketing automation. $10,000 in credits for startups with CARTA.
  • GetResponse - Email marketing service provider. 50% off lifetime. with JOINSECRET.
  • Hubspot - CRM platform. Get 30% off HubSpot’s Growth Platform with CARTA.
  • Hunter - Email marketing solution. 30% off for first 3 months with DEEL.
  • Phantom Buster - Automate sales and marketing activities. 25% off on any plans for 12 months with SECRET.
  • Pipedrive - Leads and sales management. 30% discount for 12 months with SECRETSAAS1.
  • Salesforce Essentials - CRM software for SMEs. 50% off Annual Subscription with DEVDEALS.
  • Sendinblue - Email marketing service provider. 75% off on the annual Premium Plan with DEVDEALS.
  • Snapchat - Audience engagement with Snapchat. Spend $1,000, get $1,000 with DEEL1000.
  • Zendesk - CRM & customer support platform. 6 months free Support and Sales with DEVDEALS.

Miscellaneous

  • Fiverr - Freelancing platform. 20% off your first order with JSECRET20.

Monitoring

  • Instatus - Real-time status page creation tool. 1 year free on Pro Plan with DEVDEALS.
  • New Relic - Monitor, debug, and optimize apps and systems. $125k in New Relic One credits with DEVDEALS.

Password Management

  • 1password - Password manager for families and businesses. 50% off teams with SECRET2021.
  • Auth0 - An online authentication and authorization platform. Auth0 free for 1 year with DEVDEALS.
  • Doppler - SecretOps Platform. 3 months free on Standard plan with DEEL.
  • Stytch - User infrastructure + passwordless authentication. 3 months free on Standard plan with DEVDEALS.

Payment and Billing Integration

  • Chargebee - Subscription management. Free Plan ($300/mo) with $1M rev. or 2 years with DEVDEALS.
  • Chargify - Subscription management software. 2 months free for a 1 year contract with DEVDEALS.
  • Divvy - Spend management software. 100,000 reward points after first transaction with CARTA.
  • Expensify - Global expense tracking software. 3 months free with DEEL.
  • Stripe - Integrated payments platform. Waived process fees for $20k with CARTAPTNR.
  • TravelBank - Expense & travel platform. Get 15% off your first year with CARTA.
  • TripActions - Travel, corporate card, and expense management. Free with <100 employees with CARTA.

Product Development

  • CodeLingo - Code notes. 20% discount with LAUNCH20.
  • Tara AI - Helps engineering teams using sprints, docs & tasks. 6 months of premium for free with DEEL.

SaaS tools and Services

  • Certn - Smarter background checks for all. 15% off all checks with DEEL.
  • Memberstack - No-code user accounts and online payment services. 6 months free on Pro Plan with SECRET.
  • OpenPhone - All-in-one phone system. 20% off any plan for 6 months with DEEL.
  • Retool - Build custom internal tools remarkably fast. $1,200 for Retool Cloud with DEVDEALS.
  • Shopify - Website building platform. 2 months free with SECRET.

Search

  • Algolia - Search-as-a-Service platform. $10,000 in credits valid for 1 year with DEVDEALS.

Security & compliance

  • Drata - SOC 2 and ISO 27001 compliance. 25% off annual subscription with CARTA.

  • Vanta - SOC 2, HIPAA, or ISO 27001 certificate provider. 25% off the Vanta Platform with DEVDEALS.

Storage and Media Processing

Tools for Teams and Collaboration

  • Airtable - Create apps that perfectly fit your team's needs. $2,000 Airtable credit with CARTA.

  • Twist - Team messaging platform. $300 Twist Unlimited Credits with DEELPERKS.

entry.title: librespeed/speedtest
entry.summary:
Self-hosted Speedtest for HTML5 and more. Easy setup, examples, configurable, mobile friendly. Supports PHP, Node, Multiple servers, and more

LibreSpeed

No Flash, No Java, No Websocket, No Bullshit.

This is a very lightweight Speedtest implemented in Javascript, using XMLHttpRequest and Web Workers.

Try it

Take a Speedtest

Compatibility

All modern browsers are supported: IE11, latest Edge, latest Chrome, latest Firefox, latest Safari.
Works with mobile versions too.

Features

  • Download
  • Upload
  • Ping
  • Jitter
  • IP Address, ISP, distance from server (optional)
  • Telemetry (optional)
  • Results sharing (optional)
  • Multiple Points of Test (optional)

Server requirements

  • A reasonably fast web server with Apache 2 (nginx, IIS also supported)
  • PHP 5.4 (other backends also available)
  • MySQL database to store test results (optional, PostgreSQL and SQLite also supported)
  • A fast! internet connection

Installation videos

  • Quick start installation guide for Ubuntu Server 19.04

Android app

A template to build an Android client for your LibreSpeed installation is available here.

Docker

A docker image is available on the Docker Hub, see doc_docker.md for more info about it

Go backend

A Go implementation is available in the speedtest-go repo, maintained by Maddie Zhan.

Node.js backend

A partial Node.js implementation is available in the node branch, developed by dunklesToast. It's not recommended to use at the moment.

Donate


Donate with PayPal

License

Copyright (C) 2016-2022 Federico Dossena

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with this program. If not, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.

entry.title: denysdovhan/learnyouhtml
entry.summary:
Learn you how to create your first web page

learnyouhtml

Learn you how to create your first web-page.

Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications. This workshopper will guide you through the simple exercises which explain the core principles of HTML.

Exercises

This workshopper has 11 exercises that cover the most important aspects of HTML.

  • HELLO WORLD — introduction to HTML.
  • TAGS — understanding tags.
  • ATTRIBUTES — what is tag's attributes.
  • INLINE TAGS — tags for styling text.
  • HEADINGS — tags for headings.
  • LISTS — how to create a list with HTML tags.
  • TABLES — how to compose data in table.
  • BLOCKS — block tags and semantic.
  • LINKS AND REFERENCES — how to leave a references to another page.
  • FORMS — creating of forms with control elements.
  • STYLES AND SCRIPTS — injecting styles and scripts on a page.

Requirements

  • Node.js >=6.0.0

Installation

Open your terminal and run this command:

npm install -g learnyouhtml

Use sudo if you get an EACCESS error.

Usage

Open your terminal and run the following command:

learnyouhtml

License

MIT © Denys Dovhan
